QuestData.Title: A Lesson on Trust
QuestData.Description:
The men in the fort were once under my command, and so, they are now my responsibility. Each of them should have a badge we use for identifying individuals under certain circumstances. I would ask you to bring back a number of these as proof of thinning their ranks.
These men are no longer soldiers of Boralus, and as such, no longer deserve to carry the Proudmoore anchor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you bring me those badges?
QuestData.RewardText: A grim task, but one that needed to be done.
